snippet.title: DokeV - Official Reveal Trailer | Pearl Abyss Connect 2019
snippet.description:
Watch the official game reveal trailer for DokeV, an upcoming creature-collecting open world action-adventure by Pearl Abyss, and come face-to-face for the first time with the creatures living among us!
This trailer consists of actual in-game footage.

⭐ Learn more:
https://dokeV.pearlabyss.com
https://www.twitter.com/DokeVGame 
https://www.facebook.com/DokeVGame
https://www.instagram.com/DokeVGame

What is DokeV?
DokeV is an upcoming creature-collecting open world action-adventure from Pearl Abyss filled with intriguing stories and set in a unique, vibrant world. Meet Dokebi, whimsical creatures that live side-by-side with humans and encourage people’s dreams from which they gain strength. The gorgeous and colorful world of DokeV is brimming with activities, stories, and experiences, so get ready to befriend tons of Dokebi and to embark on an adventure!

Question of the day: how do you pronounce DokeV?
Read it as "doh-keh-vee".
It's the world where the Dokebi live in!


Learn more about the track:
ROCKSTAR
Produced by 별들의전쟁 * (GALACTIKA *)

Vocals by Luena
Lyrics by 별들의전쟁 * (GALACTIKA *)
Written by 별들의전쟁 * (GALACTIKA *), 우빈 (GALACTIKA *), SameTime

Background vocals by F R I D A Y . (GALACTIKA *)
Drums by CHANG (GALACTIKA *)
Guitar by Jaepil Jeong
Bass by Jaepil Jeong

Digital editing by HONZO
Mixed by Junsung Jo (Assisted by Eunsook Heo) @W Sound

Executive Producer: PEARL ABYSS


#DokeV #PearlAbyss #RevealTrailer

About Pearl Abyss
Founded in 2010, Pearl Abyss is a global game developer known for the Black Desert MMORPG franchise. We are currently servicing Black Desert across 150 regions on PC, console, and mobile, and developing Crimson Desert, DokeV and PLAN 8 with Pearl Abyss’ proprietary next-generation engine.
